name: Rockhopper Rally
description: Inspired by the rough-and-tumble Ungstiri of OtherSpace MUSH, this text arcade game built in Twine puts you at the controls of a wildly dangerous rockhopper craft as you zoom through the asteroid fields of the Perseverance star system. After you play, consider joining us on the MUSH and creating your own character to join the adventures in real-time or asynchronous roleplaying!
